protesters set up tents in the city's central Martyrs Square similar to Tahrir. In Cairo, hundreds of state electricity workers stood in front of the South Cairo Electricity company, demanding the ouster of its director. Why are you staying here, you've ruined our lives, they chanted. Also, dozens of state museum workers demanding higher wages staged a protest in front of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, crowding around antiquities chief Zahi Hawass when he came to talk to them. Dick Cheney made a surprise appearance Thursday at the Conservative Political Action Committee Convention to present the former two-time defense secretary an award. The vice president joked that Donald Rumsfeld twice served as defense secretary and added that maybe if we give him a third term, he might get it right. Dick Cheney also drew laughs when he wondered aloud if Donald Rumsfeld may have more influence on Mr. Barack Obama than the president's current advisers. Allen Iverson 30. Allen Iverson nailed a three-pointer with 2:21 remaining to break the last tie, and the Philadelphia 76ers regained their poise and came up with enough of a balanced attack to beat the Toronto Raptors 84-79 Sunday. Nobody ever told me that winning a championship was easy, and I found out the hard way that isn't easy to win a playoff game, said Allen Iverson , who shot 10-for-30 but came though in the clutch after Toronto had rallied from a 16-point deficit. The 76ers evened the best-of-seven series at two games apiece and regained homecourt advantage heading into Game 5 Wednesday

And so was born ''the special comment'''-- his first one coming in August 2006, rebutting a speech that then-Defense Donald Rumsfeld had delivered to the American Legion. Said Keith Olbermann that night: The confusion we-- as its citizens- must now address, is stark and forbidding. But variations of it have faced our forefathers, when men like Nixon and McCarthy and Curtis LeMay have darkened our skies and obscured our flag.
